<p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:
Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#434343;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">Delphi</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#434343;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的没落有三个原因：<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:
Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#434343;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">1</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;
mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:
微软雅黑;color:#434343;mso-font-kerning:0pt">，<span lang="EN-US">Object pascal</span>并没有像<span lang="EN-US">C/C++</span>那样成为业内标准。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:
Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#434343;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#434343;mso-font-kerning:0pt">如果你使用<span lang="EN-US">C</span>或<span lang="EN-US">C++</span>写程序，可以在任何地方进行编译，例如<span lang="EN-US">Windows</span>、<span lang="EN-US">Linux</span>、手机，甚至是单片机上都可以使用<span lang="EN-US">C</span>写程序。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:
Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#434343;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#434343;mso-font-kerning:0pt">没有成为标准的后果就是跨平台，以及影响第三方编译器的出现。<span lang="EN-US">Delphi</span>曾经有一个<span lang="EN-US">Linux</span>版本叫做<span lang="EN-US">Klinx</span>但是已经好多年不再更新了。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:
Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#434343;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#434343;mso-font-kerning:0pt">所以这么多年来<span lang="EN-US">Delphi</span>只有<span lang="EN-US">Borland</span>一家公司苦苦支撑。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:
Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#434343;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:
Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#434343;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">2</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;
mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:
微软雅黑;color:#434343;mso-font-kerning:0pt">，人才流失，与内部决策失误。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:
Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#434343;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">Delphi</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#434343;mso-font-kerning:0pt">之父<span lang="EN-US">Anders Hejlsberg</span>离开<span lang="EN-US">Borland</span>去了微软，导致<span lang="EN-US">Delphi</span>的编译器有三年的时间无人敢动，因为<span lang="EN-US">Anders Hejlsberg</span>完全使用汇编实现的编译器，无人能够看懂。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:
Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#434343;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:
Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#434343;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">Anders Hejlsberg</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#434343;mso-font-kerning:0pt">去了微软之后推出了<span lang="EN-US">.NET</span>框架，主打语言是<span lang="EN-US">C#</span>，无论从类库命名还是代码风格都与<span lang="EN-US">Delphi</span>很像，<span lang="EN-US">C#</span>语法接近<span lang="EN-US">C</span>，又不兼容<span lang="EN-US">C</span>。接近<span lang="EN-US">C</span>的好处是<span lang="EN-US">C</span>系的程序员（<span lang="EN-US">C/C++/Java/PHP/</span>）很容易上手，不兼容<span lang="EN-US">C</span>的好处是没有历史负担，语法语义可以做的很优美。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:
Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#434343;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#434343;mso-font-kerning:0pt">此外决策层，频繁出现失误，有很长一段时间<span lang="EN-US">Delphi</span>盲目的去跟随<span lang="EN-US">.NET</span>，甚至<span lang="EN-US">IDE</span>都改用<span lang="EN-US">.NET</span>编写，还推出了<span lang="EN-US">VCL for .NET</span>，结果却是丢掉了<span lang="EN-US">Win32</span>原生开发，而重新编写的<span lang="EN-US">IDE</span>又存在大量<span lang="EN-US">BUG</span>，白白耗费大量时间与财力，而技术方面，无论是<span lang="EN-US">VCL</span>还是编译器、甚至<span lang="EN-US">IDE</span>从<span lang="EN-US">Delphi7</span>以后就停步不前。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;

Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#434343;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

微软雅黑;color:#434343;mso-font-kerning:0pt">，市场转变<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:
Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#434343;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#434343;mso-font-kerning:0pt">开发市场现在更注重<span lang="EN-US">B/S</span>结构的应用，桌面应用正在大幅减少，<span lang="EN-US">Delphi</span>显然不是一个理想的<span lang="EN-US">WEB</span>开发语言。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:
Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#434343;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#434343;mso-font-kerning:0pt">在桌面市场，解释执行的字节码正在成为主流，像<span lang="EN-US">Java</span>、<span lang="EN-US">C#</span>、<span lang="EN-US">Python</span>、<span lang="EN-US">Ruby</span>都是解释类语言。解释执行不容易发生内存泄露与内存错误，因为内存不再需要程序员去手动释放，程序编写更简单，语法也更加灵活，虽然效率可能会略低，但当前的趋势就是用<span lang="EN-US">CPU</span>的时间去换取更昂贵的程序员时间，因为大部分程序对效率的要求并不高。其中<span lang="EN-US">C#</span>的类库命名很接近<span lang="EN-US">Delphi</span>，<span lang="EN-US">Delphi</span>程序员转入最为<span lang="EN-US">C#</span>比较容易。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:
Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#434343;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#434343;mso-font-kerning:0pt">使用<span lang="EN-US">Delphi</span>编写一些项目，你可能需要几位比较高级的程序员才能胜任，而使用<span lang="EN-US">Java</span>或<span lang="EN-US">C#</span>只需要更少和更加普通的程序员。项目完成后<span lang="EN-US">Java</span>或<span lang="EN-US">C#</span>由于解释执行的原因会更加健壮，因为大部分问题都可以在编译期发现和解决。而<span lang="EN-US">Delphi</span>编写的应用则需要较长的<span lang="EN-US">Debug</span>时间，项目进度变慢。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:
Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#434343;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#434343;mso-font-kerning:0pt">当前的大部分项目，健壮性、开发周期、维护难度远远要比最终执行效率重要<span lang="EN-US">100</span>倍。所以企业更多的是在招聘<span lang="EN-US">Java</span>与<span lang="EN-US">C# </span>程序员，所以培训机构也在培养<span lang="EN-US">Java</span>与<span lang="EN-US">C#</span>程序员。现在根本无法见到一个像样的<span lang="EN-US">Delphi</span>的培训机构，企业在招聘<span lang="EN-US">Delphi</span>程序员的时候往往只是为了维护老旧的项目。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:
Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#434343;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#434343;mso-font-kerning:0pt">这个时候如果有新手问“我应该学习那种语言？”，“那种语言更容易就业？”。此类问题的答案是显而易见的。这对<span lang="EN-US">Delphi</span>来说是一个恶性循环。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>
